name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Purrfect Pomodoro Timer: Productivity & Time Management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the "Purrfect Pomodoro Timer": your dedicated productivity tool with a touch of feline charm!

This sleek timer not only manages your work intervals with precision but also enhances your workspace ambiance. Its intuitive design keeps you focused during work sessions while encouraging well-timed breaks for optimal productivity.

Embrace a balanced work routine with our reliable companion, designed to elevate your efficiency and foster moments of rejuvenation.

**What's new 🆕**
- New Pomodoro Calendar 📅 for your last 6 months of data
- Export and Import your data to any device
- Auto start timer after a timer finishes ⏳
- New Timer sounds 🔊
- History tab for storing and visualizing your daily, weekly, and monthly sessions 📊
- New suggestive actions to do on breaks ⚱

**Key features ⚙️**
- Short and long breaks ⏸️
- Desktop and tab notifications 🔔
- Skippable timers ⏭️
- Configurable breaks and focus timers ⚙️
- Multi-theme support 🎨
- Inspiring Quotes on every break 📖

**Coming soon 🚀**
- Delete individual sessions 🚮
- Keyboard Shortcuts 🎯
- Tags to categorize or label your pomodoros 🏷️

Pomodoro ™ and Pomodoro Technique ® are registered trademarks of Francesco Cirillo. This app is not affiliated with Francesco Cirillo.
